data.name: Monitorama Baltimore
data.description: We’re very excited to bring Monitorama back to the east coast for a new event in the great city of Baltimore. Many of you were with us for our original Boston event back in 2013, and have been asking us ever since to bring it back east again. It took a while, but we’ve finally found a venue in Balti…

relatedRecords.name: ProgressNEXT 2020
relatedRecords.description: Join us in Boston, June 2020, to learn, connect with leaders and visionaries and thrive in a digital world. ProgressNEXT is the premier event for modern application development.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: Highlights from the Manchester AWS Community Summit held in Manchester 2019. Check our Channel to view the talks in full. Our next event will be held in October in London. If you’re interested in becoming a sponsor please contact joe@comsum.co.uk.
